channel.title: administratrivia on ivychapel.ink
channel.description: Recent content in administratrivia on ivychapel.ink

item.title: War
item.description: It’s been 100 days since russia has started full-on military invasion on my homeland, Ukraine, after years of slow boiling conflict. Life has changed drastically for millions of people, including me. I am lucky to be prepared, safe (for now), and can spend my time doing something useful. Big part of my life at work and outside work right now is about using my skills and knowledge to help Ukrainain defenders in various ways.

item.title: Unblocking the writer's block
item.description: For a while I’ve been thinking of this blog as an exile for long trains of thought. Laid out in few long sessions. Driven by something that I find interesting enough and amusing enough. This blog is unlikely to carry on like that, and this is my excuse note. There have been different stages in my life and career. Some of them felt slow, some of them felt fast, some left room for play, some made me lay.
